Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At Next Seeker, we prioritize your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
Privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name and email address when creating an account. We also collect data related to your job applications and career goals to provide our service.
Privacy.section2Content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, develop new ones, and protect Next Seeker and our users.
Privacy.section2List1: Managing job applications and your dashboard
Privacy.section2List3: Sending important notifications about your account
Privacy.section3Content: We work hard to protect Next Seeker and our users from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of information we hold.
Privacy.section4Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@nextseeker.com.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.intro: By using Next Seeker, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
Terms.section1Content: By accessing or using Next Seeker, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
Terms.section2Content: Permission is granted to use Next Seeker for personal, non-commercial use. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.
Terms.section3Content: You are responsible for the content you post on Next Seeker. We do not claim ownership of your data, but you grant us permission to host it as necessary to provide the service.
Terms.section4Content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer.
Terms.section5Content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever.

Refund.title: Refund Policy
Refund.intro: We want you to be satisfied with Next Seeker. If you are not satisfied, please read our refund policy below.
Refund.section1Content: If you are not satisfied with the Unlimited Premium Plan, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. Please submit your request within 14 days of purchase.
Refund.section2Content: To request a refund, please contact us at support@nextseeker.com with your account details and reason. Processing takes 5-10 business days.
Refund.section3Content: Requests made after 14 days of purchase are generally not eligible for a refund. Accounts that violate the Terms of Service are also ineligible.
Refund.section4Content: We reserve the right to modify this refund policy at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to this page.
